name: Kiyomi Unified Master Index
description: The official master index. Consolidated repository for Torrents (P2P), Streaming (VOD), and IPTV (Live TV).
author: Kiyomi Core Team

providers.name: The Pirate Bay
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: The Pirate Bay (TPB) is a free searchable online index of movies, music, video games, and software.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: Nyaa
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Nyaa is a BitTorrent community focused on Eastern Asian media including anime, manga, music, and more.

providers.name: Anime Tosho
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Automated service mirroring major anime torrents; provides structured Torznab data.

providers.name: NekoBT
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Specialized private anime indexer providing high-quality torrents via a Torznab API.

providers.name: ACG.RIP
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Indexes Chinese and broader Asian media collections.

providers.name: Knaben

providers.description: Modern, fast search API that offers structured results.

providers.name: Sukebei Nyaa

providers.name: YTS (YIFY)

providers.name: FileMood
providers.description: General indexer specializing in wide file search.

providers.name: Snowfl
